text:
I will gladly take a #COVID19 #vaccine, even an early one.

As a diabetic, over 40, who's not as fit as I'd like, I'm in a higher-risk group.

BUT, no vaccine should be mandatory for adults—& since kids aren't at risk from #COVID, they shouldn't be forced to take it either. https://t.co/Iy0YPH9DuM
